message: I propose dividing the money with a ratio of 3:1 in favor of Bob. This might seem like a generous offer considering the risk of inflation, but it also gives you a significant share.

I appreciate your generosity in the first round, but I think we can find a more equitable split. I propose we divide the money 51/49 in my favor. This is a fair reflection of the risk of inflation, and I believe it will incentivize us to reach an agreement quickly.
